title: Sukkiim, Sukkiims, Sukkites
content:
SUKKIIM*, SUKKIIMS*, SUKKITES

A tribe who joined forces with King Shishak of Egypt and entered Palestine to wage war against King Rehoboam of Judah (930â€“913 BC). The Sukkites are mentioned with the Libyans and the Ethiopians (2 Chr 12:3). They were probably a Libyan people.
